video.title: Dinosaurs
video.synopsis: Combining advanced puppetry and animatronics, this domestic sitcom centers on a typical prehistoric suburban family of dinosaurs.

episodes.synopsis: After 24 years with the Wesayso Development Corporation, Earl asks for a raise -- and instead is terminated by his angry boss, B.P. Richfield.
episodes.title: The Mighty Megalosaurus

episodes.synopsis: When Fran feels like a dowdy, neglected housewife after hatching her third child, Earl realizes he's going to have to relearn the mating dance.
episodes.title: The Mating Dance

episodes.synopsis: When Robbie suggests that Grandma Ethyl move in with them, Earl may become the first dinosaur to give up his den in the name of family unity.
episodes.title: Hurling Day

episodes.synopsis: When a gigantic dinosaur falls for Fran at the grocery store, he decides he wants her -- and everything else Earl loves -- for his own.
episodes.title: High Noon

episodes.synopsis: Robbie rebels against the dinosaur tradition of howling as the rite of passage to adulthood.
episodes.title: The Howling

episodes.synopsis: The Council of Elders announces that Baby's golden horn makes him the long-awaited king of the dinosaurs!
episodes.title: The Golden Child

episodes.synopsis: When a meteorite crushes the Sinclairs' television set, Earl decides they could all use a little family togetherness by competing on a game show.
episodes.title: Family Challenge

episodes.synopsis: Robbie hangs out with some radical herbivores, but they have more than their diets to worry about when they run into a hungry swamp monster.
episodes.title: I Never Ate for My Father

episodes.synopsis: Earl tries to deal with his own frustrations as he refuses to accept the fact that his "little girl" Charlene is turning into a woman.
episodes.title: Charlene's Tale

episodes.synopsis: Earl buys two very rare, delicious and expensive creatures called grapdelites to dine on with Fran for their 20th anniversary.
episodes.title: Endangered Species

episodes.synopsis: When Earl is named Employee of the Month, the Sinclairs prepare themselves for a visit from Earl's fearsome boss, B.P. Richfield.
episodes.title: Employee of the Month

episodes.synopsis: Against Fran and Earl's wishes, Charlene secretly fills in for Robbie when he is supposed to watch Baby.
episodes.title: When Food Goes Bad

episodes.synopsis: Earl is elated at the news that the all-powerful job wizard has assigned young Robbie the lifetime job of tree pusher.
episodes.title: Career Opportunities

episodes.synopsis: When Fran and Earl's marriage license expires, Earl flunks all the renewal tests.
episodes.title: Unmarried with Children

episodes.synopsis: Robbie falls under the bad influence of the uncivilized Spike, who insists that Robbie has to be macho if he wants to succeed with girls.
episodes.title: How to Pick Up Girls

episodes.synopsis: Much to Earl's joy, a nest and egg mix-up at birth means that the Baby belongs to somebody else.
episodes.title: Switched at Birth

episodes.synopsis: Dinosaurs everywhere get ready to celebrate the tradition of Refrigerator Day -- but the Sinclairs' refrigerator has been repossessed.
episodes.title: Refrigerator Day

episodes.synopsis: Monica gets a job pushing down trees for Wesayso but is fired after refusing the advances of a new co-worker known for his double entendres.
episodes.title: What Sexual Harris Meant

episodes.synopsis: Earl suffers the slings and arrows of humiliation because Fran has traded her household duties for those of a talk show hostess.
episodes.title: Fran Live

episodes.synopsis: When Robbie gains widespread attention for his science project about clean energy, the Wesayso corporate bosses connive to discredit his idea.
episodes.title: Power Erupts

episodes.synopsis: Robbie and his friend Spike find a groovy new plant in the woods that produces a very happy mood in anyone munching its leaves.
episodes.title: A New Leaf

episodes.synopsis: The Sinclairs are flabbergasted when Ethyl comes back from a near-death experience and becomes the star attraction on a TV show selling the afterlife.
episodes.title: The Last Temptation of Ethyl

episodes.synopsis: As war flares with rival dinosaurs over the flow of pistachio nuts, Robbie goes off to fight in Operation We Are Right, much to his parents' dismay.
episodes.title: Nuts to War: Part I

episodes.synopsis: Earl, dressed as a USO volunteer, finds Robbie at the battlefront and begs him to come home. But Robbie has now become a firm believer in the fight.
episodes.title: Nuts to War: Part II

episodes.synopsis: Charlene, caught up in status-seeking at school, spends all her college education money on an expensive talking coat.
episodes.title: Slave to Fashion

episodes.synopsis: Just as Baby Sinclair is about to receive an official name, the chief Elder dies, and Earl is chosen as a candidate in the race for a new chief Elder.
episodes.title: And the Winner Is...

episodes.synopsis: Tired of getting beaten up, Robbie asks to join his friend Spike's vicious, disgusting gang, the Scavengers, for protection.
episodes.title: Leader of the Pack

episodes.synopsis: Earl is elated when his Wesayso bosses pick the Sinclair family to star in a commercial campaign to promote the company.
episodes.title: Wesayso Knows Best

episodes.synopsis: The Baby rebels furiously against his Earl's attempts to toilet train him and escapes into the woods, where hungry predators seek to devour him.
episodes.title: Nature Calls

episodes.synopsis: Earl refuses to talk to Robbie, who has reached the embarrassing age at which his legs go into an involuntary dance whenever he sees a pretty girl.
episodes.title: Dirty Dancing

episodes.synopsis: Earl and Fran can't figure out how to handle the Baby, who keeps repeating a dirty word he picked up from watching television.
episodes.title: Baby Talk

episodes.synopsis: Earl's responses as a test subject to new TV shows prove so accurate that he is hired as a network executive and becomes a huge hit.
episodes.title: Network Genius

episodes.synopsis: Earl thinks he has realized his dreams of fame and fortune by discovering a new, uncharted land -- until the inhabitants hold Robbie and Baby hostage.
episodes.title: The Discovery

episodes.synopsis: The Baby frightens Robbie, so to retaliate, Robbie tells him a terrifying story about being attacked by a rabid Wereman one moonlit autumn night.
episodes.title: Little Boy Boo

episodes.synopsis: As mischievous germs party inside flu-ridden Baby, worry-ridden Earl and Fran pay a fortune to a pricey doctor to treat the child.
episodes.title: Germ Warfare

episodes.synopsis: A chance meeting leads to romance between Robbie and Wendy, the daughter of Earl's overbearing boss. But there's a bad rumor circulating about Wendy.
episodes.title: Hungry For Love

episodes.synopsis: Overreacting to some routine sparring between Earl and Baby, the Parent Patrol suspends Earl's license to parent.
episodes.title: License To Parent

episodes.synopsis: Charlene's theory that the world is round gets her arrested and prosecuted for heresy -- while brother Robbie scrambles to round up a defense witness.
episodes.title: Charlene's Flat World

episodes.synopsis: In a ceremonial assertion of megalosaurian machismo, Warrior Chief Earl, his sons and close male friends embark upon a sacred ritual: a camping trip.
episodes.title: Wilderness Weekend

episodes.synopsis: A rebellious Robbie challenges Earl at the Office of Male Supremacy and becomes the dominant male in the Sinclair household.
episodes.title: The Son Also Rises

episodes.synopsis: Infuriated by Earl's insensitivity to her needs, Charlene joins a species exchange program and moves in with the Poupon bird family.
episodes.title: Getting To Know You

episodes.synopsis: When recession forces Earl, Roy, Sid and Gus out of their jobs, all four-legged dinosaurs are blamed -- and banished to the other side of the swamp.
episodes.title: Green Card

episodes.synopsis: The Baby, chosen to star in a frying pan commercial, turns into an instant celebrity and becomes a spoiled brat.
episodes.title: Out Of The Frying Pan

episodes.synopsis: Romance is in the air, and Robbie tries to compete with a muscle-bound colleague for the affections of comely Caroline Foxworth.
episodes.title: Steroids To Heaven

episodes.synopsis: When Fran's funk over her dull existence as housewife and mother reaches the crisis level, she quits in favor of volunteer social-service work.
episodes.title: Honey, I Miss The Kids

episodes.synopsis: Robbie, introduced to the wailing, funky blues sounds of "swamp music" played by racially denigrated swamp mammals, tries to get them a record deal.
episodes.title: Swamp Music

episodes.synopsis: Earl, struck by a lightning bolt, exchanges his spiritual essence with that of a willow tree.
episodes.title: If You Were A Tree

episodes.synopsis: A visit from a terrifying alien changes Earl into a passionate environmental crusader against greedy corporations like Wesayso.
episodes.title: We Are Not Alone

episodes.synopsis: Trying to win Fran's and Earl's attention, Charlene creates a stage show with some cavelings (human children) and it becomes popular.
episodes.title: Charlene And Her Amazing Humans

episodes.synopsis: After watching a horror movie on TV, Baby refuses to go to sleep, insisting there's a monster under the bed.
episodes.title: Monster Under The Bed

episodes.synopsis: When Earl falls into a toxic waste site and develops super powers, he is thrilled because Baby pays attention to him now.
episodes.title: Earl, Don't Be A Hero

episodes.synopsis: When Baby asks "Where do we come from?" the whole Pangaean culture is turned on its head to find an answer.
episodes.title: The Greatest Story Ever Told

episodes.synopsis: Earl is miffed when he has to drive his mother-in-law to her 60th high school class reunion -- it's an eight-hour trip.
episodes.title: Driving Miss Ethyl

episodes.synopsis: When Earl is injured on the job, Robbie and Fran trick him into slapping Wesayso with the world's first worker's compensation suit.
episodes.title: Earl's Big Jackpot

episodes.synopsis: When Baby turns 2 years old, he becomes an intolerable monster. Earl and Fran attempt to control the possessed child.
episodes.title: Terrible Twos

episodes.synopsis: The construction of a Wesayso factory throws a kink into the "ecosystem," and Earl heads a civilian task force responsible for the fate of the world.
episodes.title: Changing Nature

episodes.synopsis: Earl's game day is interrupted when he has to take Baby into the woods for a traditional ritual to show the Baby that he needs his family.
episodes.title: Into The Woods

episodes.synopsis: Earl's estranged sister, Pearl, is a big country music star. Robbie and Charlene sneak out against Earl's wishes to see her perform.
episodes.title: Scent Of A Reptile

episodes.synopsis: Charlene attempts to break into the male-dominated workforce and get a job to pay for her summer wilderness trip.
episodes.title: Working Girl

episodes.synopsis: When too many overworked employees drop dead from exhaustion, businesses give dinosaurs two weeks off for a vacation.
episodes.title: Variations On A Theme Park

episodes.synopsis: After seeing the television show "Lifestyles of Those We Envy," Earl makes a deal with the devil for a Fernhill mug thinking it will make him happy.
episodes.title: Life In The Faust Lane

episodes.synopsis: Charlene's scent gland comes in and Fran explains the one boy who is attracted to her scent is the one she's destined to marry.
episodes.title: Earl And Pearl

episodes.synopsis: When Earl dresses up as Georgie, an orange hippo that is the latest hit in children's television, he is arrested for copyright infringement.
episodes.title: Georgie Must Die
